chat_history.message:
Hello,
My iPhone 13 has a problem:
I need to add the VAT number: B65966673
Thank you,
Hello, my iPhone 13 has a problem: The company ID is missing : B65966673 if you could please add it. Thank you,

Dear, Ecomobile:

A pleasure to communicate with you.

The client has indicated to us that he needs the CIF number of his company on the invoice.

I share the information: B65966673

could you issue another invoice taking this information into account?

I will look forward for your answer.

Regards,
Jerry from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

Attatched is the invoice including the CIF number of the customer's company.

Regards,
JH
